Package view

Class ToDoView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
view.ToDoView
public class ToDoView
extends javafx.application.Application
This file will provide implementation for the GUI part of ToDo application using JavaFX. The application would have multiple functionality such as add task, add list, change due/date/location and save on close which all interactive through the gui.
Author:
Quang Vu, Ofer Greenberg, Quan Nguyen, Allen David El

  • Nested Class Summary

    • displayTasks

      private void displayTasks​(java.lang.String listName)
      Overloading displayTasks (). This function will basically load the list of listName and display all of the task it hold.
      Parameters:
      listName - the name of the list which its task will be displayed.
